vlive.korean: 네? '토레타가 힘들 정도면 ㅋㅋㅋ' 여러분 참나~ What? "If Toreta was hard... (laughs)" Everyone! My goodness. 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연락👋🏼
vlive.english: What? "If Toreta was hard... (laughs)" Everyone! My goodness.

vlive.korean: 힘들... 뭐지, 그건? Tire...what was it? 듣기 View video ITZY : ❤️
힘들 때... When I'm going through a hard time... 듣기 View video iKON : 잠시만 놀자~!
vlive.english: When I'm going through a hard time...

vlive.korean: 좀 많이 힘들 수 있겠지? It could be really tiring, right? 듣기 View video KBS예능 : 세븐틴 에스쿱스&승관 <안녕하세요> 대기실 vlive!
vlive.english: It could be really tiring, right?

vlive.korean: 아마... 아들이 제일 힘들 겁니다. I bet it's the hardest for your son. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: I bet it's the hardest for your son.

examples.korean: Checking all the information will be slow and laborious. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 정보를 모두 확인하는 일은 더디고 힘들 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Checking all the information will be slow and laborious. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In Africa life can be hard. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아프리카에서는 생활[사는 것]이 힘들 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In Africa life can be hard. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The next six months will be the hardest. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (그) 다음 6개월이 가장 힘들 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The next six months will be the hardest. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At times, the heat was barely tolerable. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 때로는 더위가 참기 힘들 정도였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At times, the heat was barely tolerable. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Life on the road can be very hard. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이리저리 옮겨 다니는 삶은 아주 힘들 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
